title: Four-Year Doping Ban on Miguel Ángel López Upheld by Court of Arbitration for Sport
content:
"Superman" López remains banned for use of Menotropin after officials reject plea; in brighter news, contract extensions handed to Lippert, Landa, and Pogačar's liutenants.

Read the full article at Four-Year Doping Ban on Miguel Ángel López Upheld by Court of Arbitration for Sport on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
